page.title: 15WILBERFOSS SMALL BUSINESSES
page.content: As Wilberfoss is a rural area not many people work in the village on their own account. However it was found that there was a self-employed joiner, a hairdresser,2 garden centre owners,a secretarial agency and a small firm specialising in ready to lay turf all working from or in the village. Most of these people have to work fairly long hours to make a living wage, but think that working for themselves is worth the effort. Asked about her job the mobile hair- dresser said that she started her bus- iness because she could see a demand for it. She has some 7 or 8 clients per day and in 1985 she felt that after being in business for about 1 uear, prospects were good. Despite gloomy predictions she has found that there have been few problems and even the dreaded VATis manageable.
